name: D365FOBuildAnalayzer
description: Analyzes the compiler and best practice output logs for warnings, informations and ToDos to provide a build summary about them. And if needed the build can be failed
author: Dominik Downarowicz

inputs.name: logPath
inputs.label: Working Directory for the logfiles
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory where the task can search for the compiler and best practice log files. If not set the task will use the default working directory of the build.
